name: Beetle Breakout
description:
Help the beetle escape the rising water by building a tunnel to the surface!

Controls:   
Arrow keys - Select Tunnel Piece
Z - Place Tunnel Piece
X - Redraw  Tunnel Pieces (Use Shuffle)

You start out with 3 shuffles, and can collect more as you dig. If you want a greater challenge, try collecting the 7 coins in each stage!

This game is a submission to the 2020 GMTK Jam, which had the theme of 'Out of Control'. This theme is represented in two ways here - the out of control rising water, and the random selection of tunnel pieces. Thanks for playing, feel free to let me know what you thought of this in a comment!

Credits:
Soundole  (Peter Anthony Smith) - Art, Design, Programming
Bookwyrmle (Erin Harrison) - Art, Design
Peter Jones - Music,   Playtesting
